name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
User contribution
On October 24, Hunan Normal University will hold a lecture on "Confucian Marxism"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 21, Japan. The incidents of farmers in many parts of China rushing into other people's fields to grab peanuts and corn have been reported by many Japanese media.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Follow-up
The girl said that she has resigned and cannot comment on the incident.
Her video has been deleted, including the post on the school forum. The original follow-up post was deleted by the school and replaced with a positive thank you from Fuzhou Unicom.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
A new type of hacking mode has appeared in Telegram. The hacker will send a hacking SMS following the real Telegram SMS. At present, some overseas dissidents have been hacked.
Please be cautious. Please set up a second login verification for Telegram. Check the website URL before opening any link. Do not scan QR codes from unknown sources.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 16, Chongqing. The former principal of Kaiming Experimental School used a loudspeaker to protest against the acquisition of school funds in front of the Communist Party branch committee of the Institute of Education and Science Bashu Experimental School.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: October 16, Qinzhou, Guangxi. Villagers in Wuli Town, Lingshan County protested against the developer blocking the road
